pageProduct.name: OsteoEze Dual Action Glucosamine Sulfate + Chondroitin 60 Tablets
pageProduct.description:
General Information

OsteoEze Dual Action contains a combination of glucosamine and chondroitin to help provide relief from osteoarthritis and joint pain.

Warnings

If symptoms persist consult your healthcare professional. Vitamin supplements should not replace a balanced diet.

Common Uses

OsteoEze Dual Action may help to: 

  • Provide temporary relief of joint pain associated with osteoarthritis
  • Reduce joint stiffness and pain associated with osteoarthritis
  • Improve joint mobility and flexibility
  • Support the body’s natural cartilage construction

Ingredients

Glucosamine sulfate 750mg (from Glucosamine sulfate sodium chloride 942mg); Chondroitin sulfate sodium 400mg; Manganese 1mg (from Manganese sulfate monohydrate 3.08mg); Magnesium 25mg (from Magnesium phosphate tribasic 125mg); Ascorbic acid (Vitamin C) 45mg.

Directions

Take 2 tablets daily or as professionally prescribed.
